content: *note 09-01-15 pattern update available with penguin chart and stars/snowflakes over trees * the pattern and charts here correspond to some christmas stockings i ve made and posted on my ravelry page they are patrick s stocking 1 mom s stocking 2 becky s stocking 3 oscar s stocking 4 and apol s stocking 5 **edging patterns aren t given** and i cannot provide them please make creative use of a stitch dictionary or visit nicky epstein s edging books such as *over the edge* or *on the edge* **some of the photos shown on this page the last three contain designs or charts not included in the pattern ** they are featured here to show how some knitters applied their own creativity to create unique stockings this is an untested pattern i m posting these charts and some basic instructions in hopes that knitters who enjoy colorwork will have some fun with them i recommend them to anyone who knows how to knit a sock and how to knit with two or more yarns at at time please let me know if you have any difficulties with the pattern 1 http //www ravelry com/projects/spindleknitter/patricks-stocking 2 http //www ravelry com/projects/spindleknitter/moms-stocking 3 http //www ravelry com/projects/spindleknitter/beckys-stocking 4 http //www ravelry com/projects/spindleknitter/oscars-stocking 5 http //www ravelry com/projects/spindleknitter/spindleknitters-stockings-5
